title: Multiply by 1
text: The first step is to multiply the measurement to be converted by 1; write 1 as a fraction relating the units given and the units needed.

title: Relating Hours to Seconds
text: The conversion from hours to seconds is 1 $$hour=3600$$ seconds.

title: Writing 1 as a Fraction
text: Using the relation between hours and seconds, we can rewrite the 1 we multiply in the first step as (3600 seconds)/(1 hour), so we get the expression (1.5 hours)*(3600 seconds)/(1 hour).

title: Simplifying
text: Hour divides out, so we get the expression (1.5)*(3600 seconds)/1.

title: Multiplying
text: Multiply the expression, we get the final answer 5400 seconds.
